actions.low: Allow the transfer but keep standard audit trail.
actions.medium: Queue the transfer for secondary approval and notify compliance analyst.
actions.high: Block the transfer and open a fraud investigation ticket.

factors.amount_zscore: Transfer amount is an outlier compared to the org's recent activity.
factors.same_day_velocity: Spike in transfers recorded for the same settlement date.
factors.payee_concentration: Transfers heavily concentrated to a single counterparty.
factors.recent_velocity: High volume of transfers in the last hour.
